item.title: TensorFlow with Eli Bixby: GCPPodcast 31
item.description:
Description

Original post: https://www.gcppodcast.com/post/episode-31-tensorflow-with-eli-bixby/

Eli Bixby, Developer Programs Engineer at Google, tells your cohosts Francesc and Mark all about TensorFlow and its applications. Do you want to know what neural networks are? Why does TensorFlow exists? How to get started with it? We cover that and more in our thirsty first episode.
item.dc:creator: Eli Bixby

item.title: Diving into Machine Learning through TensorFlow
item.description:
Description

Speakers: Julia Ferraioli, Amy Unruh, Eli Bixby

Machine learning can be an intimidating subject. In this session, we’ll get practical, hands-on experience with core concepts in machine learning with TensorFlow, an open source deep learning library. We’ll introduce the basics of TensorFlow, including how to ingest and prepare raw data for use, run a variety of algorithms to gain insight from the data, and have some fun with visualization.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
item.dc:creator: Julia Ferraioli
